posts.post_content:
Here's the deal:
For every card you pay full price for, you get a 2nd card for half price.  The 2nd card must have a list price that is equal to or less than the list price of the 1st card.      
You will also need to pay S&H of $10 for the cards.
The cards are listed at [url]http://pclcards.blogspot.com[/url].
Hurry while supplies last.  PM is preferred way to get hold of me.
